snippet: Germany's president opened a weekend of commemoration on Friday with a quiet visit to a simple museum dedicated to a Berlin manufacturer who saved Jews from the Nazis.
lead_paragraph: Germany's president opened a weekend of commemoration on Friday with a quiet visit to a simple museum dedicated to a Berlin manufacturer who saved Jews from the Nazis.

headline.main: Germany Looks Back on Pogroms and Saviors
headline.print_headline: Germany Looks Back on Pogroms and Saviors
